item.title: 從零開始的 Infrastructure as Code: Terraform - 01
item.description: This article is part of 從零開始的 Infrastructu as Code: Terraform 01 - Introduction to Infrastructure as Code [02 - Terraform 簡介與基本操作] [03 - 為公司導入 Terraform] Get-started examples / SOP on Github Introducation to Terraform Iac: Speaker transcript Check my website chechia.net for other blog. Follow my page to get notification. Like my page if you really like it :) Outlline our story: issues, steps, & results basics IaC, terraform benefits risks and 坑 to be or not to be experience oriented
